title: Date Caramel
ingredients: ½cup full-fat coconut milk (use the solid part on top), plus more as needed
directions: Add the dates to a small bowl and cover with boiling water for 15 minutes to soften.
Transfer the waterlogged dates to a blender with the coconut milk. Blend until smooth, adding more coconut milk if needed, and pour into a jar.
Stir in the vanilla, salt, and cinnamon.
Cool completely, then cover and refrigerate.
